about.title: Fullstack developer passionate about building complete and user-focused web applications
aboutMes: I specialize in fullstack web development, focusing on creating seamless, efficient, and visually appealing digital experiences.
I enjoy working on both the frontend and backend, turning ideas into fully functional web applications.
I love exploring new technologies, learning continuously, and improving my skills to stay current with modern development practices.
My goal is to build scalable, high-quality web products that provide real value and great experiences for users.

projects.title: Discover my journey through projects, with each one marking a step forward in my growth and learning.
Restaurant Management System
projects.description: A restaurant management application with features for ordering, reservations, menu management, and revenue statistics. Developed by a team of 5 using the MVC model.
projects.highlight: Integrated user authentication, role-based access for managers/staff, and intuitive revenue reports.

projects.title: AI-powered Video Creation Platform
projects.description: A web platform that enables automatic short video creation from text, integrating Text-to-Speech, image-to-video conversion, and auto-generated subtitles.
projects.highlight: Combined React + Tailwind frontend with Python backend for AI processing, simplifying the video creation process.

projects.title: ACCI Exam Management System
projects.description: A system for managing English & IT certification exams (ACCI), supporting registration, payment, renewal, issuing exam slips, and certification.
projects.highlight: Implemented separate FE/BE with a fully modeled business process from registration to certification issuance.

projects.title: Agency Management System
projects.description: An application for managing goods, import/export, and revenue reports. Developed by a team of 4 using the MVC model.
projects.highlight: Provides intuitive revenue statistics, helping managers quickly assess business performance.

projects.title: Remote Desktop
projects.description: A LAN-based remote desktop application using client-server model, transmitting screen images and controlling mouse and keyboard.
projects.highlight: Applied socket programming and multithreading to optimize data transmission and reduce latency.

projects.title: Course Management (Console App)
projects.description: A C++ console application to manage students, courses, registration, and grading.
projects.highlight: Implemented full CRUD operations in a console environment, strengthening data structure and OOP skills.
